General.Name: Guangzhou Frontop Digital Creative Technology Co. Ltd. A
General.Description: Guangzhou Frontop Digital Creative Technology Corporation offers digital multimedia display services. the company engages in the digital creative product business, which uses 3D visualization technology, digital multimedia technology, software development technology, etc. to provide customers with three-dimensional high-definition promotional videos, film and television animation and advertisements, digital sand table, virtual reality and augmented reality systems, digital multimedia interactive systems, stereoscopic (holographic) imaging systems, application software development, and other services. It also offers digital imaging solutions that use computer graphics, and image production and processing technology to simulate the real environment through computer 3D simulation software according to the floor plan or structure diagram provided by the customer; and space creative design, exhibition design, digital content creation, intelligent central control and integration software development, decoration, equipment installation and system integration services, etc. The company was founded in 2002 and is based in Guangzhou, China.
